<<<<<<< HEAD
Cæsarion, or, Historical, political, and moral discourses in four days entertainment between two gentlemen, very pleasant and useful for all orders of men whatsoever / English'd by Jos. Walker. Cesarion ou Entretiens divers. English Saint-Réal, M. l'abbé de (César Vichard), 1639-1692. Walker, Joseph.
[8], 175 p.
Printed by J. Streater, and are to be sold by John Weld ..., London : MDCLXXXV [1685]
Translation of César Vichard de Saint-Réal's Cesarion ou Entretiens divers -- NUC pre-1956 imprints. Marginal notes. Imperfect: print show-through, with some loss of print. Reproduction of original in the British Library.
=======
